data.title: IT Concepts Awarded a $100M+ Social Security Administration (SSA) Contract to Support Chief Information Security Officer (CISO)
data.text: The Social Security Administration (SSA) recently awarded leading consulting and information technology (IT) provider IT Concepts (ITC) a $100M+ contract to support the Chief Information Security Officer (CISO)’s enterprise-wide cybersecurity program. “As the primary contract for cybersecurity services supporting all Commissioner/CISO-related efforts, this call order is critical to SSA’s high-profile mission. Our team is proud to support SSA’s dynamic cybersecurity program, protect the sensitive data of the American public, and safeguard Agency data from improper disclosure, abuse, and fraud”, said Pinakin Patel, Chief Executive Officer. One of the leading providers of information technology services to the U.S. Federal Government, ITC provides deep domain expertise and IT, cyber, and data services that drive transformative change. Special thanks to our SSA delivery teams – this win is built on our 19+ year history of delivering value for SSA every day.
